prompt: Design a products list interface with a horizontal scrollable layout for a carousel effect. Each product card should have a rectangular icon placeholder at the top, product name in bold black typography, a short description in gray, and the price in teal. Include an 'Add to Cart' button with a red background. Use a white scaffold background with medium card shadows. Ensure 16px padding around the list and 12px between cards. The app bar should have a white background with a black title and no elevation.
